channel.title: How can I make xp higher in the wilderness? [easyrsc]
channel.description: I'm not to sure of how to do this, but I would like to be able to implement this in my server. If anyone can help me it would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: How can I make xp higher in the wilderness? [easyrsc]
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

[quote=“The Djinn, post:4, topic:439677”] if (player.getLocation().inWilderness()) { //exp shit code here } else { //regular exp do shit code here } [/quote]

Considering it’ll be thrown in the Player class, the “player.getLocation()” will just throw an error upon compiling.

A simple “getLocation()” will do the job.

Read full topic
item.source: How can I make xp higher in the wilderness? [easyrsc]

you obv are new, so your not going to understand what roger has said, so i would just use the search button bro its simple and can save you alot of time waiting. If you want to make a server it is alot of time, so if you cant be bothered to search then i wouldnt start at all
